title: MUTU Food & Drink
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Fusion, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Upscale cafe on a 2 level contemporary space, connected to Maytaq Wasin Boutique Hotel. A mural illustrates the Incan traditions towards the land, the farmers and mother earth (PachaMama). Offers a varied menu based on local and seasonal produce with around 19 or so vegetarian dishes of which 6 or so are vegan; could ask to omit cheese. Has street access and is 2 blocks from the main square in Cusco.
